title: GA doesn't work properly with the Perfect timing rune
body: It says the cooldown is reduced with 15%. However, even though the timer in the inventory is correct, the item doesn't activate even though the cooldown has finished. This happens every game for me, and it is quite frustrating.

replies.body: Just double checked - you are correct and we have this as a logged bug atm. Sorry this is frustrating. :c

Question.**_ Zoe's E applies a new type of CC called Sleep. Sleep puts an enemy to sleep after a delay and damaging a sleeping target deals bonus true damage._ **Is this correct?

this is not the only issue with stopwatch btw , if you get a commencing stopwatch , a zhonya and buy another stopwatch , use the commencing stopwatch , it will break the stopwatch you bought and commencing stopwatch will go on a cd of 90 s instead , which means you can use it again every 90 s , while also reducing your zhonya cd , which basically means you have now 2 zhonyas ( noticed that in a pratice tool game as i was playing bard , wanted to check how long i can stay in zhonya , tried to buy all form of statsis , so basically 2 different stopwatches , a zhonya and my R and this bug occured ) . However after using that like 10 times it will eventually break too . Didnt try to build it into another zhonya to check if you can have 2 separate zhonyas , but i got a replay of it since after noticing this bug i finished the botgame in order to get the replay . Sent that to bug report thing but no response yet tho and cant send replays to them.

Thank you for sending us a bug report and for the extra detail here. 

Sending those reports in through the client bug reporting tool or the "bug splat" prompt if you crash is the MOST helpful thing you can do to help us catch bugs. We don't reply directly to player reports but we log them & track them in our internal systems (hence how I was able to figure out if we knew about this bug already or not).
